document_data.name: Maskado's Maps & Legends
document_data.mainbody: '''Maskado's Maps & Legends''' was a bookshop in [[Neverwinter]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. Its owner was the mysterious [[Maskado]].
document_data.Location: It was one of a number of other booksellers, bookbinders, and scribes on a winding street running southeast of the [[House of Knowledge (Neverwinter)|House of Knowledge]], in the [[City Core (Neverwinter)|City Core]] district.
document_data.Services:
Among these, Maskado's dealt specially in maps, records, and information concerned with exploration of the [[North]], such as trails, uncommon and secret routes, and treasure tales.

Simple [[map]]s or scraps of writing with information sold at Maskado's had a cost of 100 [[gp]], while more detailed and accurate maps and treasure maps could cost twice as much. However, Maskado purchased such things from adventures for far less.
